programme.title: Despicable Me 3

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: With a revenge-thirsty assassin hot on their heels, Dominic Toretto, Brian O'Conner and the rest of the crew come together as a team to protect their own.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: A rebellious student, a notoriously disliked professor, and the school’s head chef form an unlikely bond, as they are the only one’s left on-campus for Christmas break, helping one another understand that they are not beholden to their past.

programme.title: Land Of Bad
programme.desc: When a Delta Force team is ambushed in enemy territory, their only hope lies with an Air Force drone pilot to guide them through a brutal 48-hour battle for survival.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Celebrate the life of an icon who inspired generations through his message of love, peace, and unity. In this uplifting film, discover Bob Marley's story of overcoming adversity and the journey behind his revolutionary music that changed the world.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, ‘Cart’ tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: Oh! My Gran
programme.desc: When his daughter suffer from a hit-and-run accident, her father tries to track down the driver with help from his mother who has Alzheimer's disease and the only witness to this accident.

programme.title: The Face Reader
programme.desc: Nae-gyeong is the most skillful face reader in all of Joeson dynasty. After his abilities are acknowledged, he gets pulled into a royal power struggle involving the King's successor.

programme.title: Metamorphosis
programme.desc: An evil spirit that changes faces infiltrates a family, placing one brother in danger while the other tries to save him.

programme.title: The Divine Move
programme.desc: Go player Tae-Seok is framed and imprisoned for his brother's death after losing a high-stakes game. After his sentence, he sets out for revenge against the underground gambler who destroyed his life.

programme.title: The Attorney
programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.title: 0.0Mhz
programme.desc: A group of thrill seekers try to prove the existence of ghost by using radio frequency technology inside the notorious haunted asylum.

programme.title: Waiting For Rain
programme.desc: An unmotivated student regains his passion for life after exchanging letters with his childhood friend and promise to meet if it rains on December 31st each year.

programme.title: The Terror, Live
programme.desc: A newsman discovers he's been rigged with a bomb after he has an exclusive interview with a terrorist who blew up a bridge.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: Shoot Me In The Heart
programme.desc: A young man develops schizophrenia after his mother's suicide. After he meets a kindred spirit at the psychiatric hospital, he forges a plan with the man to escape.

programme.title: The Tiger
programme.desc: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger in the country.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yi’s building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this “Qilin” isn’t an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict “no-babies” policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a suitcase and a hotel brochure, it’s time to take a trip to The Dollhouse Hotel! For our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Pillow Cat sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But it turns out that someone's locked King Catnip in the tower and without him they'll have to cancel the Royal Knighting Ceremony! It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben’s travels to Hastings and discovers a holistic fully vertically integrated approach to creating grass fed Angus beef. He ventures to the local farmers market and meets amazing local food producers, reinforcing the abundance of produce grown in the region.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben’s meets an Orchardist and Food Innovation specialist. They have a shared vision to make all natural varietal – led apple juice, using the best technology in the world. He also checks out over 30 varieties of figs grown in the Mediterranean type climate of Hawkes Bay.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben takes a boat to visit a salmon farm in Akaroa and learns the difference between NZ King and Atlantic salmon. programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: This episode follows the journeys of these magnificent humpbacks, from their feeding grounds to their breeding grounds, the tender moments between mother and calf, and see the dangers their calves face in their first few months, including incredible interactions with predatory killer whales. The humpbacks also face a world full of human threats, from large container ships, to the impact of seismic testing in the search for oil and gas, now threatening their very survival once more.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: Often referred to as the dinosaur fish, the coelacanth occupies a unique place in the fossil record, and when it was rediscovered almost a century ago it shook the scientific community. We follow its journey to the present day, accompanying WildOceans' scientists on an expedition to uncover more of their secrets and behaviours.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yi’s building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this “Qilin” isn’t an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D’Angelo and Alex.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom hatches an unorthodox plan to use a monstrous Nightmare to test Alex’s new fire suits that endangers the secret of dragons.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Gran announces it’s time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she’s got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: Across the Strait
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Government’s policy of “one country, two systems” in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmen’s understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Phi, a veteran boxer, sets out on a quest for revenge after the ruthless crime lord Ba Rau killed his wife. His journey takes him into the remote village near Foggy Mountain, where he discovers Ba Rau's human trafficking activities. The final showdown is inevitable as Phi must take down Ba Rau to save the villagers and avenge his wife’s death.

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kong’s Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: Military veteran Wu and undercover cop Ming rescue hostages on an island near Bangkok. When Wu discovers his daughter has also been captured, he stays with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3

Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: Keith takes the team to see a house in the Wadeview Park neighbourhood that he's been chasing for two years due to probate issues. In Keith's mind, it's been time well-spent because of the low price.

programme.title: Yuri's Winning Recipe (S2)
programme.desc: Yuri has been passionately posting home-cooked food on her Instagram account. Is there any better way to fall in love with cooking than experimenting with new recipes and sharing them with viewers?

programme.title: Rachael Ray In Tuscany
programme.desc: Rachael's friend, author Anna Gass, demonstrates how to make an Italian potato and horseradish frittata, a traditional snack from the Basilicata region of Italy.

programme.title: Rachael Ray In Tuscany
programme.desc: Author and chef Sara Moulton joins Rachael in her Tuscan kitchen to create a meal using ingredients from Rachael's pantry. Sara prepares a free-form crostata using a variety of vegetables.

programme.title: Kings Of BBQ
programme.desc: Anthony and Cedric dive head-first into the tedious (yet delicious) task of menu planning - calling on friends, mentors, and award winning pitmasters Rasheed Phillips and Kevin Bludso to guide the way.

programme.title: Oceanfront Property Hunt
programme.desc: Dalene and Pete have lived a nomadic life for many years and want to find an oceanfront home to put down roots while still sparking their creativity. Will they be able finally to settle down?

programme.title: Oceanfront Property Hunt
programme.desc: Sara and Russell are ready to escape the sweltering southern heat and start afresh in a charming fishing village along the East Coast. They're searching for the perfect home to embrace a coastal lifestyle.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The auditions continue as chefs from the Midwest battle it out for a coveted spot in the top 20. Each contestant has 45 minutes to prepare a signature dish that will impress the judges.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Pad Thai is a crowd favourite, and less intimidating to make than you might think. This recipe literally takes minutes, so Rachael makes the dish twice, with shrimp and with chicken.

programme.title: Giving Hope: The Ni'Cola Mitchell Story
programme.desc: Ni'Cola Mitchell, successful author, realises at a book signing that her calling is to help disadvantaged girls. She launches Girls Who Brunch, to make young women feel seen and empowered.

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1)
programme.desc: Five celebrity friends go on a trip together but at each stop where it costs money, they will have to play games against each other to be exempt from paying. One final loser will cover the costs for all.

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics
programme.desc: Sound the fire alarm! These chefs have a penchant for peppers so they're twisting classic foods and cranking the heat up. Grab a glass of milk because these twisted dishes will set your taste buds on fire.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: Chauncey turns the tables on Derek by buying a tiny house without consulting him. But when a garage conversion turns into a permitting mess, will this Chauncey Special turn into a Chauncey Nightmare?

programme.desc: Ni'Cola Mitchell, successful author, realises at a book signing that her calling is to help disadvantaged girls. She launches Girls Who Brunch, to make young women feel seen and empowered.

programme.title: The Paramedic Who Stalked Me
programme.desc: After an accident, a young woman finds herself the target of the EMT who saved her life. She reminds him of his high school love who died - and he will do anything to have her back in his life.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The auditions conclude with chefs from the South. Each contestant has 45 minutes to prepare a signature dish that will impress the judges and secure the five remaining spots in the top 20.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy heads to two restaurants with huge reputations. First up is DiFara Pizza in Brooklyn, New York to learn the secrets to their famous slice. Then it's off to visit Mini Kabob in Glendale, California.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: Alynne ropes the team into a triplex renovation with her friend Octavian, who is in way over his head. A good deal with huge profit potential quickly turns into a costly venture due to Octavian's ways.

programme.title: Verified Live
programme.desc: Matthew Amroliwala presents all the latest global and UK news, live from London.

programme.title: Focus On Africa

programme.title: Pangarap Ko Ang Ibigin Ka
programme.desc: Although Rafael (Christopher de Leon) feels that he is not yet ready for another commitments, Alexis (Regine Velasquez) feels that he is the one she has been looking for.

programme.title: Seoulmeyt
programme.desc: A Filipina K-drama fan meets the man of her dreams but things take a turn as she discovers the truth behind his pretend personality.

programme.title: Dahil Ba Sa Kanya?
programme.desc: The first time Jed (Aga Muhlach) sees Mitch (Mikee Cojuangco), he is instantly smitten by her. But no matter how much Jed wants to pursue Mitch, he cannot because his cousin, Jonas (Onemig Bondoc), is already courting her.

programme.title: Sisterakas
programme.desc: The childhoods of Bernice (Vice Ganda) & Detty (Ai-Ai Delas Alas) were world's apart, but they did have one thing in common: their father. Headed by the eccentric yet equally brilliant & talented Roselle (Kris Aquino) the competition gets tougher, and a string of events lead to the two company heads fighting over the once expendable Detty.

programme.title: Never Not Love You
programme.desc: It tells the story of young lovers who tries to build a life together until career opportunities sends them to a different country where their relationship will be tested.

programme.title: Boso
programme.desc: Jake (Epy Quizon) is a caretaker at a boarding residence that houses a whole array of characters. Through the holes he has carved on the ceiling, he has become privy to their most intimate and darkest secrets.

programme.title: Tililing
programme.desc: Three interns are assigned in an asylum where they meet three mental patients. Through their stories, the interns get to enter their world and learn their painful experiences.

programme.title: Linlang
programme.desc: Rich, beautiful and in love, Lance and Lyra are an ideal couple. But the end of their blissful marriage begins when Lance meets Jill. The love triangle distorts their perspectives, and ultimately, it leads to a tragic death.

programme.title: Hustler
programme.desc: George is an excellent pool player and has in fact, established a reputation in the field of billiards. Later, he decided to take advantage of his talent and used the sport as a source of living.

programme.title: Sons of Nanay Sabel
programme.desc: After she was accused of being a negligent mother, Sabel's (Ai-ai delas Alas) wedding to Prince Harry was cancelled. To make things right, she embarks on a journey to find her estranged sons and reunite her family.

programme.title: Magbuwag Ta Kay
programme.desc: "Magbuwag Ta Kay" (Let's Break Up, Kay) revolves around college sweethearts Roy (Rowell Ucat) and Kay (Akiko Solon), who have to come to terms of their looming breakup.

programme.title: On Vodka, Beers and Regrets
programme.desc: A washed up actress and former child star Jane Pineda (Bela Padilla), battles with love, chances and alcoholism as her career plummets to rock bottom.

programme.title: Matalino Man Ang Matsing, Naiisahan Din!
programme.desc: Their personalities are as opposite as the two poles, and the worlds they respectively belong to be perpetually at odds. Gener (Eddie Garcia) is an accomplished policeman whose track record in solving crimes is exceptional, while Mando (Willie Revillame ) is a slick con man who has a knack at wearing disguises.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 E31 - Bewitched, Bothered, and Infuriated
programme.desc: A witch married to an ordinary man cannot resist using her magic powers to solve the problems her family faces and their relationship grows stronger despite all difficulties.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 E32 - Nobody but a Frog Knows How to Live
programme.desc: A witch married to an ordinary man cannot resist using her magic powers to solve the problems her family faces and their relationship grows stronger despite all difficulties.

programme.title: T. J. Hooker S1 E05 - The Witness
programme.desc: Partnered with a hot-headed young rookie, Hooker's tough, no-nonsense ways often see him clash with the Captain but he always gets the job done and is determined to rid the streets of crime.

programme.title: Frasier S6 E09 - Roz, A Loan
programme.desc: In the sixth season of FRASIER, Frasier finally begins to believe that his life is going smoothly, for once. The rug is soon pulled out from under him when the radio station changes its format to a salsa -- leaving him without a job.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S6 E08 - Joltin' George
programme.desc: With his dry-cleaning business booming, George Jefferson moves his family--level-headed wife Louise and son Lionel to the upper east side. But life in a luxurious Manhattan high-rise holds unexpected pitfalls for George.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot S6 E01 - Hercule Poirot's Christmas (Part 1)
programme.desc: David Suchet portrays the inspired Belgian investigator, Hercule Poirot; creating a unique catalogue of timeless crime fiction.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: In our modern world, we tend to think that technology and scientific knowledge can help protect us from almost anything, including natural disasters. But is that really true?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Who was Jack the Ripper? The question has baffled police investigators, historians, and armchair detectives. Countless books, movies, and television shows were based on the Ripper's murderous exploits.

programme.title: Ride n' Seek Philippines With Jaime Dempsey (S1)
programme.desc: En route through Isabela province, Jaime is persuaded to trade her bike for a racing buffalo. Unfortunately, the buffalo isn’t keen to be ridden and makes its displeasure known.

programme.title: Ride n' Seek Philippines With Jaime Dempsey (S1)
programme.desc: Jaime ditches her bike and takes the journey’s final leg on foot – a climb up mountains to meet the legendary tattoo artist Fang Od. The tattoo itself is a painful process in primitive conditions.

programme.title: Alone (S11)
programme.desc: As the temperature dips well below freezing, the river stops paying dividends. The three participants are forced to weigh tapping out versus a lifetime of regret.

programme.desc: Gabriel (Chuck Perez) decides to enter the seminary to escape the violent world his family is involved with. But he soon realizes that he cannot totally breakout from his legacy.

programme.title: Estudyante Blues
programme.desc: The hit song by well-known folk singer, Freddie Aguilar, "Anak", was the basis for this light-hearted tale about campus life. Escapades of eight young men who were classmates in school but who also had to deal with their personal problems.

programme.title: Manchichiritchit
programme.desc: The reigning Queen of Comedy, Maricel Soriano, met rapper-comedian Andrew E in this delightful tale about con artists getting a heart of gold.

programme.title: Kahit Wala Ka Na
programme.desc: Love triangles will always be with us as long as romantic melodramas are made for the screen. The latest trio are Sharon Cuneta, Richard Gomez and TonTon Gutierrez. Sharon plays Irene, the wife torn between two men.

programme.title: Ulo Ng Gang-Ho
programme.desc: The life story of Viyong, a notorious police from Balic-Balic, Samaloc.

programme.title: Laruan
programme.desc: Joy (Carmi Martin) has only one ambition in life--to get rich and give her family a more comfortable life. She enslaves herself to William (Mark Gil) in her hope that he will help her achieve her goal.

programme.title: Reputasyon
programme.desc: What a nice schoolgirl like Miya Brown (Mia Nolasco) doing in a club as G.R.O.? She has learned that there is life beyond her mother's world and that of her father's.

programme.title: Anino Ni Asedillo
programme.desc: The legacy of the legendary hero Asedillo (Fernando Poe, Jr.) lives on. A simple school teacher who fought for the rights of others at the cost of his life. Asedillo is the role model of Simon (Conrad Poe). He becomes an active union official in the factory he is working for to lobby for workers' rights.

programme.title: Sa Diyos Lang Ako Susuko
programme.desc: Romano disobeyed his father when he became a soldier. The old man believed that peace could only be attained if people were to avoid all forms of violence. How ironic for him then to come home and find his father murdered and the criminals unknown and unpunished?

programme.title: Blue Jeans Gang
programme.desc: Brian (Keempee de Leon), Alan (Gary Estrada), Jerry (Kier Legaspi), Tom (Joko Diaz), Jojo(Michael Rivero), and Pat (Dennis Padilla) call themselves the BLUE JEANS GANG. They consider themselves to be more like brothers than friends.

programme.title: Judge Max Asuncion, Hukom Bitay
programme.desc: Based on the real-life adventures of Judge Max Asuncion who was known as a stickler for the law and as a man who got death threats for breakfast.

programme.title: Pretty Boy
programme.desc: Andrew E times two doubles the fun in this comedy about mistaken identities and the hilarious results. Andrew played Pretty Boy, a well-known gangster who was dressed in designer suits.

programme.title: Buy One, Take One
programme.desc: Salve (Sharon) and Sion (Susan) are sisters living with their grandparents. One day, Salve's friend invites her to apply for abroad only to be tricked because it was an illegal recruitment agency selling women for foreigners.

programme.title: Great Adevntures!

programme.title: Everyone Can Help

programme.title: Playtime!

programme.title: Singing Fun Time!
programme.desc: It's singing fun time! The family sings about the black sheep at the farm, does the baby shark dance & gets ready for bed with a lullaby.

programme.title: If You're Happy and You Know It!

programme.desc: Every day is a playdate! Join JJ & his friends as they learn, play, & sing together in a story all about friendship.

programme.title: JJ Has Fun With Animal Friends!
programme.desc: It’s a day of play with JJ’s favorite animal pals! Sing about a little lamb, a friendly sheep, & a dog named BINGO.

programme.title: Winner

programme.title: Party Time Pogo

programme.title: Fun and Play At the Garage

programme.title: Thankful Pie
programme.desc: The team bakes a thankful pie for Grandma! They also have to catch a runaway tire, rescue a boat with a tow rope & play a game of football.

programme.title: Learning City Farm
programme.desc: It's a learning city farm! Count the buses, make a salad & learn how to recycle with all your friends.

programme.title: Singing Fun!

programme.title: Mid Autumn fun with JJ
programme.desc: Have some Mid-Autumn fun with JJ! The family has a pretend play day, makes pasta with Grandma & enjoys some delicious rainbow popsicles.

programme.title: Mid-Autumn Food Party
programme.desc: It's a Mid-Autumn food party! The family gets some exercise, Dad pretends to be an ice cream man & the friends make rainbow popsicles.

programme.title: Mid-Autumn Festival Thanks
programme.desc: It's a Mid-Autumn Festival of thanks! The family sings about gratitude, makes rainbow popsicles & learns that it's good to be thankful.

The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.desc: In our fast-moving challenging world it is of fundamental importance to sort what's true from what's fake online. programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: Keep up with the latest news from all over the globe with Focus on France 24. Focus programme provides exclusive reports from Monday to Friday at 7.50 am Paris time. But little does he know that she plans to kill both him and the princess, and that the return of the treasure will mean the extinction of mankind.

programme.title: Confidence
programme.desc: Jake Vig is a con man with a gift for duplicity and a natural charm. Now he’s cooked up the con of a lifetime to even the score for the murder of a buddy, pay back those he owes, and get the hell out of the business while he’s still drawing breath.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: A lawyer blinded by radioactive waste fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero, using his other senses, which have been enhanced.

programme.title: Elektra
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Elektra unwittingly takes part in her former teacher's test when she protects a former target and his daughter from "The Hand," a sinister crime syndicate of martial arts fighters.

programme.title: Epic Movie
programme.desc: Two of the warped writers of Scary Movie now set their parodic sights on the largest genre of them all: Hollywood's big-budget, special effects-laden, blockbuster franchise films.

programme.title: Conan The Destroyer
programme.desc: Conan is asked by the evil Queen Taramis to accompany a beautiful young princess in finding a magic treasure. If he returns with the treasure and the princess, the Queen promises to bring Conan's beloved Valeria back from the dead. But little does he know that she plans to kill both him and the princess, and that the return of the treasure will mean the extinction of mankind.

programme.title: Confidence

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: L.A. Confidential

programme.title: Rocky

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: Two disrespectful and unruly students act out during their teacher, Mr Gale’s class. Unable to tolerate their behaviour, Mr Gale decides to take the two boys hostage and teach them a lesson that they will never forget.

programme.title: Jealousy
programme.desc: Model Min is admitted to a hospital, but mysteriously falls to her death at night. Rumour has it that the hospital is haunted. Subsequently, Min's photographer begins receiving eerie phone calls, the writer loses consciousness in a bizarre car accident, and her friend mysteriously disappears…

programme.title: Death of a Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Christine was found brutally murdered in the woods, her boyfriend, a forest ranger and a farmer are summoned to an inquest. Each suspect has his version to tell, but as the investigation progresses, a dark secret is uncovered, which would reveal the real murderer.

programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: WIFI
programme.desc: Li Hong Shan’s wife died in a car accident. One year later, he suddenly receives a message from his dead wife. Li vows to save his wife's life through this time transcending WIFI signal, but ends up uncovering a bigger conspiracy behind…

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: A struggling writer must write a hit novel to save his career. He retreats to his childhood home where his father, also a successful writer, died mysteriously. Upon discovering his father's final manuscript, he realizes it's far superior to anything he could create. He decides to plagiarize the work, setting off a series of horrifying events.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When a mother of three is found lying unconscious beneath her open, second-story window, Medical Examiner Dr. Dragovic suspects there is more than meets the eye.

programme.title: The Jars Murderer
programme.desc: After murdering and dismembering his victims, a Hong Kong taxi driver often kept their organs and indulged in necrophilia.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Reselling scrap junk became very hard as the market for scrap metal pays much less and so Andy had talked his mother into getting a reverse mortgage on the property.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Heartbreaking accounts of families torn apart by crime. Ashley Wallace, who was almost killed by her own mother, Jenny Carrieri, whose search for her sister's murderer consumed her life.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: When a beloved schoolteacher is found murdered in her Neptune, New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: One wrong move could get anyone booked in; like a son who landed himself in jail after his dad rear-ended a car, or a gearhead who gets spotted by a helicopter after allegedly doing a burnout.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: A man is killed instantly after a head-on collision with a young mother driving home from a late-night shift at a Florida hotel. The Prosecution allege she was under the influence and caused the crash.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: A 21-year-old man is charged with domestic terrorism after a spree of shootings on the freeway sends the public into panic. Facing over 100 years in prison, the young father claims he has an alibi.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A simple snack at a local restaurant turns violent when a grandmother is ripped off, but does not give up. A woman takes on the man who slammed into her van and then tries to run.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A brave grandma fights off two carjackers intent on stealing her truck; a woman stands up against heinous domestic violence; two assailants pull a gun on a store manager who escapes.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When an Army Sergeant is gunned down on New Year's Eve, investigators are at a loss on who would harm the beloved family man, until fellow soldiers in his unit confess shocking secrets to solve his murder.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes her apartment building were a luxury hotel for a sleepover, but finds herself too busy to enjoy it with friends. // When Hazel's wish for 1,500 minutes of fame angers Principal Krentz, she must find a way to speed up time.

programme.title: Danger Force
